title: Trump ends Biden’s fuel standards, slashes costs for American drivers
description: President Trump signed an executive order reversing Biden’s stringent fuel efficiency rules, lowering the target from ~50 mpg by 2031 to ~34.5 mpg, claiming it will save families $1,000 per vehicle and $109 billion collectively over five years. Auto executive…
